original_title: The Deadly Basement of a 4chan Doomer
overview: in 2017 the home of a reclusive multimillionaire was set ablaze. Inside firefighters discovered deplorable hoarding conditions, the charred body of a young man, and a secret tunnel sustem sprawling 200ft underground, One year later the owner of the home, Daniel Beckwitt, was charged and convicted of 2nd degree Depraved Heart Murder
title: The Deadly Basement of a 4chan Doomer
